Functions
LR_fnc_ResetTargets
Description

Used to set pop up targets to fall when hit and then up on laptop command.

Arguments
_object

Object the addaction is applied to. <OBJECT>

_title

The name of the addaction, visable to players. <STRING>

_center

Center of area to check for Pop up targets <ARRAY>

_distance

How far from center point to look for Pop Up targets <STRING>

Examples
[this, "Reset Targets", [1200,4200,0], 250] call LR_fnc_ResetTargets;
[MyLaptopName, "Reset 300m Range", [5500,3522,0], 300] call LR_fnc_ResetTargets;

Author: MitchJC
